title: The 6 Voyages of Lone Sloane
description: Facing the cosmic winds, a man, an earthling, standing on a stone throne, flies in space. In his illuminated eyes shines the red glow of madness. 800 years after a catastrophic event called the "Great Fear", Lone Sloane, a troubled space traveler, is captured by an entity called "He Who Seeks", after his space ship is destroyed. The entity transports him to different dimensions, where he faces a myriad of Lovecraftian challenges!
author: Philippe Druillet
